sentences: Asuka Kuramochi (倉持 明日香, Kuramochi Asuka, born September 11, 1989, in Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan) is a singer, actress, and a former member of the idol group AKB48 under Team K.
On September 8, she debuted with Yuki Kashiwagi and Aki Takajō as French Kiss.
On July 18, Asuka announced that she will be graduating from AKB48 to pursue a career in sportscasting.
Her final performance day was on August 17.
